comment: The predicate "is a first-countable topology." This can be described as "every point has a countable local basis" - that is, every point has a countable collection of open sets containing it such that every open set containing the point has an open set from this collection as a subset. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Aug-2009.)
